1 stove = 5 years of smoke-free cooking And saves our planet 15 tonnes of carbon pollution

Buy A Stove or Part of One!

With a simple stove, we can:

Help poor families use half the amount of firewood

Spending 4-6 hours a week gathering firewood is a drag. Our Dos por Tres stove cuts the time in half.

Provide cooks with 5 years of smoke-free cooking

Users don’t “buy a stove” but co-invest in their stove by supplying local materials. Here’s why we have a no cash model and engineered the stove to last.

Save our planet from 15 tonnes of carbon pollution

We all emit carbon pollution into the atmosphere every day. Installing an Improved Stove like ours reduces CO2 emissions.

Help 17 Microenterprises grow

Our stove is built from scratch from local materials; we support construction companies, brick makers and steel workers among others.

Why Choose Mirador?

Experience

More than 100,000 stoves built, but 500,000 families still need them.

Mirador began work in 2004 with 3 employees. We now have 130 direct and indirect employees. Here’s how we work from the community up.

Learn About Our Experience.

Leadership

On-the-ground in Honduras and United States business know-how

Our team has overseen the scaled up construction of more than 100,000 stoves in the last 5 years by Ejecutores of the project, and collectively manage over 130 employees.

Meet the Mirador people.

Data

We know where our stoves are and who is using them.

Every technician has a smart phone and we collect household data on every stove.
